definition: towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: I always get a negative response.
sentences.chinese: 我向來都得到否定的回答。

sentences.english: In particular - he says - there's no climate of respecting failure.
sentences.chinese: 他特別指出，印度人向來不畏失敗。

sentences.english: I never seem to be able to pay attention to our teacher.
sentences.chinese: 我似乎向來就沒法去注意我們的老師。

sentences.english: The ordered development of the Singapore society is always approved by the countries all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡社會的有序發展向來被世界各國所認同。

sentences.english: Professor Pietro is always on good terms with his students.
sentences.chinese: 皮特羅教授向來和學生處得不錯。

sentences.english: Pakistan has always been the ready testing ground for defence-related technologies from China.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦向來是中國防務相關技術的試驗場。

sentences.english: I always liked you, Joe, and stood up for you, too.
sentences.chinese: 喬，我向來都喜歡你，也總是站在你一邊的。

sentences.english: " But for men, divorce has been traditionally easy.
sentences.chinese: 但對於男人，離婚向來很容易。
土庫曼人向來是遊牧民族。

sentences.english: TO CREATE life is the prerogative of gods.
sentences.chinese: 製造生命向來是上帝的特權。

sentences.english: We've always understood your point of view .
sentences.chinese: 我們向來都很理解你的觀點。

sentences.english: Feedback (of any kind) and patches are always welcome.
sentences.chinese: 任何形式的反饋或者補丁向來都是受歡迎的。

sentences.english: There's a history of the underdog using standup comedy to speak truth to power.
sentences.chinese: 向來都有被壓迫的人借滑稽說笑向當權者說出真相。

sentences.english: Media test drive has always been unconstrained woolgather.
sentences.chinese: 媒體試駕向來是天馬行空，獨往獨來。

sentences.english: Since those pigeons always followed their leader's orders, they fasted willingly.
sentences.chinese: 五百隻鳥向來都是聽從鳥王的命令，果真乖乖地禁食。

sentences.english: Establishing the geo-strategy of China is always an important issue of the international politics.
sentences.chinese: 中國地緣戰略的制定向來是一個重大的現實國際問題。
